CustomField.description: This is an auto-calculated field that displays the required number of points a member needs to have to remain in a tier by the next reset period. This field is updated every time a member moves up or down a tier.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is an auto-calculated field that displays the required number of points a member needs to have to remain in a tier by the next reset period. This field is updated every time a member moves up or down a tier.
CustomField.label: Status Points To Remain In Tier
